Advisory.Description:
## Remote Code Execution Vulnerability due to Sandbox Bypass

### Impact

- Remote Code Execution
- Cross Site Scripting

### Patches

There will be no patch available.

### Workarounds

Please use other packages like [vm2](https://www.npmjs.com/package/vm2).

### References

The issue was originally reported to the project [vm2](https://github.com/patriksimek/vm2) by @XmiliaH in an issue [here](https://github.com/patriksimek/vm2/issues/197).
Advisory.Summary: Remote code execution in npm safer-eval
